abstract: DealBook’s Andrew Ross Sorkin and a pool of other reporters are taking questions for Berkshire Hathaway’s Warren Buffett. We’ll pick a few to ask the Oracle of Omaha — send them to us via e-mail or leave them in the comments.
snippet: DealBook’s Andrew Ross Sorkin and a pool of other reporters are taking questions for Berkshire Hathaway’s Warren Buffett. We’ll pick a few to ask the Oracle of Omaha — send them to us via e-mail or leave them in the comments.
lead_paragraph: It’s that time of year again: Warren E. Buffett of Berkshire Hathaway has released his annual letter to shareholders, a document read by investors around the world.
